cast.name: 奥茨杰·欧扎皮里奇 Özge Özpirinçci
恩金·尤兹图尔克 Engin Öztürk
涅西普·梅米利 Necip Memili
梅里奇·阿拉尔 Meric Aral

director.name: 阿里潭.顿麻兹 Altan Dönmez

trans_title: 箱子的气味 第二季
introduction: Filiz and her daughters arrive in Urfa for the wedding and the whole mansion is filled with wedding excitement. Hasan's sister, Gülnaz, makes it clear with her occasional remarks that she doesn't like Filiz. Even though Filiz doesn't like Gülnaz either, they manage for the wedding. Bora, who decides to go to the wedding at the last minute, is surprised to see Karsu at the celebration dinner. As Filiz rummages through Hasan's study in the hope of finding evidence, Gülnaz arrives. She becomes suspicious of Filiz's behavior and demeanor. Seeing that Karsu has filed for custody again, Reha shows up at Karsu's door to settle the score. However, Karsu has no intention of backing down. Reha asks Lale to help him investigate Karsu's husband, Can. Türkan is very surprised to see Ayça, whose relationship with her bankrupt husband has deteriorated, standing in front of her with suitcases in her hands.
chinese_title: 箱子的气味 第二季
